Posts.Content: jaw53 wrote: On the 10th of this month, I went to see a psychologist on my ordeal.  Remember when I told you about the terminal disease and skin and all of that stuff - I sure like to know where my post is.  But the psychologist looked at my records on the computer and she stated that there was no incidence of the surgeon stating that my breast cancer is terminal - she had explained to me that my surgeon is specifying the worst case scenario and the facts - that is all.  So, that is good news - psychologist says that "i am not going to die in the not too distant future!  On the 14th of the month, I have to go for a consult on radiation.  I also have another appointment with the psychologist 28-february, so I feel better and I can rest for now.  Counseling seems to help me.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Some Good News jaw53 cp418
